item.title: Who Owns the Moon? | Space Law & Outer Space Treaties
Legal implications of an encounter with extraterrestrial intelligence
item.description:
Legal implications of an encounter with extraterrestrial intelligence

For decades, scientists and filmmakers alike have dedicated tremendous efforts to speculate about two main issues concerning extraterrestrial intelligent life forms. One, do they exist? Two, what would happen if they come to visit us on Earth? This article scrutinizes the legal issues that may arise after a close contact of human civilization with intelligent extraterrestrials.

item.title: New US space mining law to spark interplanetary gold rush
item.description:
New US space mining law to spark interplanetary gold rush

Flashing some interplanetary gold bling and sipping "space water" might sound far-fetched, but both could soon be reality, thanks to a new US law that legalizes cosmic mining. In a first, President Barack Obama signed legislation at the end of November that allows commercial extraction of minerals and other materials, including water, from asteroids and the moon.
